fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, swap places with another Mafia member as they take their lunch break. If they're voted out, you are instead. It is not revealed you have swapped until necessary (ie: either of you are voted out).
- At night, Extort a town player, swapping places with them the next day without anyone knowing. It'll only be revealed when necessary (Ie: Either of you are voted out). You can only do this once.
